code:
---
template_name: "gantt-template"
description: "Gantt chart template for project timeline visualization"
variables:
  title: "Project Timeline"
  tasks:
    - name: "Planning"
      start: "2024-01-01"
      end: "2024-01-07"
      status: "done"
    - name: "Development"
      start: "2024-01-08"
      end: "2024-01-21"
      status: "active"
    - name: "Testing"
      start: "2024-01-22"
      end: "2024-01-28"
      status: "pending"
    - name: "Deployment"
      start: "2024-01-29"
      end: "2024-01-31"
      status: "pending"
---

gantt
    title {{title}}
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    section Phase 1
    {% for task in tasks %}
    {{task.name}}    :{{task.status}}, {{task.start}}, {{task.end}}
    {% endfor %}
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
